inclusion.criterion: Chronic liver failure-ACLF in Cirrhosis study in China, the Ch-CANONIC study (NCT02457637)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Acute-on chronic liver failure (ACLF) was first described by Japanese researchers in 1995.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: hepatocellular carcinoma or other liver malignancies
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has HCV Cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. Patient also describes new imbalance leading to a fall during which he may have hit his head on.
